results.title: But names will never hurt
results.brief_description: SUMMARY: An English/Canadian boy comes to realise how prejudice affects everyone involved. Designed to help 8-10 year olds understand and cope with their emotions

results.title: The bioengineers
results.brief_description: SUMMARY: An exploration of the new combination of biology and engineering at Oak Ridge National Laboratory, with special emphasis on the investigation of human cells. The film also studies molecular biology and the control of disease

results.title: Access
results.brief_description: “Summary: discusses the growth of computer information networks in the united states in recent years and how they can facilitate the individual’s access to the ever-expanding amounts of information available”
